comments.creator: joey@mozilla.com
comments.text:
browser/app/Makefile.in

  1) libs repackage:: targets should be wrapped by a platform conditional so they will only be visible to mac { /macbuild/, /Contents/MacOS/, ... }.

  2) filesystem traversal overhead:
     o find $(DIST)/$(APP_NAME).app -type d -name "CVS" -prune [....]
     o most of the copy commands are using rsync --exclude CVS.  If any cp -R commands are picking up stray CVS/ directories replacing them with rsync --exclude will allow removing the explicit filesystem traversal to delete them.

  3) Some of the copy/rsync commands can be combined into a single command { copy named sources into a generic target directory } reducing the number of shells that must be spawned.
